link.description: The optional link, user can follow the link to check extra details

^(min_length)$.description: min_length is the minimum length for password, should no less than 8.

^(password_rotation)$.description: password_rotation requires users to reset their password after the duration.

^(require_letter)$.description: require_letter requires the password must contains at least one letter, regardless of upper case or lower case

^(require_number)$.description: require_number requires the password must contains at least one number.

^(require_reset_password_for_first_login.description: require_reset_password_for_first_login requires users to reset their password after the 1st login.

^(require_special_character)$.description: require_special_character requires the password must contains at least one special character.

^(require_uppercase_letter)$.description: require_uppercase_letter requires the password must contains at least one upper case letter.

minLength.description: min_length is the minimum length for password, should no less than 8.

passwordRotation.description: password_rotation requires users to reset their password after the duration.

requireLetter.description: require_letter requires the password must contains at least one letter, regardless of upper case or lower case

requireNumber.description: require_number requires the password must contains at least one number.

requireResetPasswordForFirstLogin.description: require_reset_password_for_first_login requires users to reset their password after the 1st login.

requireSpecialCharacter.description: require_special_character requires the password must contains at least one special character.

requireUppercaseLetter.description: require_uppercase_letter requires the password must contains at least one upper case letter.

^(branding_logo)$.description: The branding logo as a data URI (e.g. data:image/png;base64,...).

^(directory_sync_token)$.description: The token for directory sync authentication.

^(disallow_password_signin)$.description: Whether to disallow password signin. (Except workspace admins)

^(disallow_signup)$.description: Disallow self-service signup, users can only be invited by the owner.

^(enable_audit_log_stdout)$.description:
Whether to enable audit logging to stdout in structured JSON format.
 Requires TEAM or ENTERPRISE license.

^(enable_metric_collection)$.description: Whether to enable metric collection for the workspace.

^(enforce_identity_domain)$.description: Only user and group from the domains can be created and login.

^(external_url)$.description: The external URL is used for sso authentication callback.

^(inactive_session_timeout)$.description: The session expiration time if not activity detected for the user. Value <= 0 means no limit.

^(maximum_role_expiration)$.description: The max duration for role expired.

brandingLogo.description: The branding logo as a data URI (e.g. data:image/png;base64,...).

directorySyncToken.description: The token for directory sync authentication.

disallowPasswordSignin.description: Whether to disallow password signin. (Except workspace admins)

disallowSignup.description: Disallow self-service signup, users can only be invited by the owner.

enableAuditLogStdout.description:
Whether to enable audit logging to stdout in structured JSON format.
 Requires TEAM or ENTERPRISE license.

enableMetricCollection.description: Whether to enable metric collection for the workspace.

enforceIdentityDomain.description: Only user and group from the domains can be created and login.

externalUrl.description: The external URL is used for sso authentication callback.

inactiveSessionTimeout.description: The session expiration time if not activity detected for the user. Value <= 0 means no limit.

maximumRoleExpiration.description: The max duration for role expired.

watermark.description:
Whether to display watermark on pages.
 Requires ENTERPRISE license.
